entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:02 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:02 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
